scripts.start: npm run build-css && concurrently --kill-others "npm run watch-js" "npm run sass-watch" "ntl dev"
scripts.copy: rm -rf public && mkdir public && cp -r src/* public/
scripts.build: npm run copy && npm run build-js && npm run build-css
scripts.build-css: npm run build-css-main && npm run build-css-single
scripts.build-js: npm run build-cms && npm run build-site && npm run build-cart
scripts.build-site: browserify src/js/load-single-product.js -p esmify > public/js/load-single-product.js && browserify src/js/load-products.js -p esmify > public/js/load-products.js && npm run build-buy-page
scripts.watch-js: concurrently --kill-others "watchify src/js/load-single-product.js -v -p esmify -o public/js/load-single-product.js" "watchify src/js/load-products.js -v -p esmify -o public/js/load-products.js" "watchify src/js/cart-page.js -v -p esmify -o public/js/cart-page.js" "watchify src/js/buy.js -v -p esmify -o public/js/buy.js"
scripts.test-cms: npm run build-js && browserify test-browser/index.js | htmlify src/admin/index.html | tape-run --static=public --input html | tap-spec
scripts.test-website: npm run build-js && browserify test-browser/index.js | htmlify src/index.html | tape-run --static=public --input html | tap-spec
